sentences.en: a diamond ring
sentences.cn: 钻戒

sentences.en: a plain silver ring
sentences.cn: 一枚素面银戒指

sentences.en: After at least eight rings, an ancient-sounding maid answered the phone.
sentences.cn: 电话至少八声后，一位听上去很老的女仆接了。

sentences.en: Any minute now, that phone is going to ring.
sentences.cn: 那部电话随时可能响。

sentences.en: As she passed the library door, the telephone began to ring.
sentences.cn: 她经过图书室门口时，电话响了。

sentences.en: Do ring if you want to talk about it.
sentences.cn: 你要是想谈谈，一定给我打电话。

sentences.en: every morning she coughed she rang in sick.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨她一咳嗽，就打电话给单位说病了。

sentences.en: Frank took a large ring of keys from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克从口袋里掏出一大串钥匙。

sentences.en: he left Washington with the president's praises ringing in his ears.
sentences.cn: 他离开了华盛顿，耳边仍回响着总统的赞扬。

sentences.en: he left Washington with the president's praises ringing in his ears.
sentences.cn: 他离开了华盛顿，耳边仍回响着总统的赞扬。

sentences.en: He left Washington with the president’s praises ringing in his ears.
sentences.cn: 他离开了华盛顿，总统的赞扬还在他耳际回响。

sentences.en: He used to ring his possessive mother several times a day.
sentences.cn: 他母亲控制欲很强，过去他常常一天给她打好几次电话。

sentences.en: He will never again be allowed inside a British boxing ring.
sentences.cn: 他被永久禁止踏入英国拳击赛场。

sentences.en: I rang the doorbell but no one came.
sentences.cn: 我按了门铃，但没有人来。

sentences.en: I would ring when I got back to the hotel.
sentences.cn: 我回到酒店就会打电话。

sentences.en: I'll ring the hotel. I'll tell them we'll check in tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我来给旅馆打电话，通知他们我们明天入住。

sentences.en: If you'd like more information, ring the Hotline on 414 3929.
sentences.cn: 如果想了解更多信息，请拨打热线电话4143929。

sentences.en: rang up several consecutive victories.
sentences.cn: 取得几次连续性的胜利

sentences.en: Ring the changes by adding spices, dried fruit or olives.
sentences.cn: 加点香料、干果或橄榄以换换口味。

sentences.en: ring up a sale.
sentences.cn: 把销售额记入收银机上

sentences.en: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
sentences.cn: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

sentences.en: The band struck up, and riders paraded round the ring.
sentences.cn: 乐队开始奏乐，骑手们列队绕场行进。

sentences.en: the bells were beginning to ring out the old year.
sentences.cn: 钟鸣辞旧岁。

sentences.en: The door was opened before she could ring the bell.
sentences.cn: 她还没来得及按门铃，门就开了。

sentences.en: The tarnish lay thick on the inside of the ring.
sentences.cn: 戒指内侧有一层厚厚的锈斑。

sentences.en: We'll give him a ring as soon as we get back.
sentences.cn: 我们一回来就会给他打电话。

words.tran_cn: 环状的；戴戒指的；有环的；被包围的
套环，投环；按铃者；敲钟者
给…打电话（ring的过去式和过去分词）
戒指；铃声，钟声；拳击场；环形物

phrases.tran_cn: (英)（尤指与工作地点）通电话报告，电话联系
回荡在耳边，留在记忆中
环形激光器，环式激光器
(英)（尤指为查明或安排某事）给（几个人）打电话
鸣钟（或好似鸣钟）迎来（或送走）

phrases.phrase: run (或 make) rings round (或 around) someone
throw one's hat in the ring

trans.tran_cn: 戒指，环状物，圆形（表演场），炉口，帮派，铃声，清晰的响声，特性
trans.tran_en: a small square area surrounded by ropes, where people  box  or  wrestle

trans.tran_cn: 包围，给…戴上金属环，画圈，打电话，铃响，按铃，回响，充满
trans.tran_en: if a sound or remark rings in your ears, you continue to remember it very clearly, exactly as it sounded, after it has finished
